name: myfitnesspal_search_food
description: Search MyFitnessPal food database. Returns results with titles, URLs, and metadata.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for MyFitnessPal food database

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.food-description, [class*="FoodItem"], li.food-item, .search-results li').forEach((el,i) => { if(i>=15) return; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a, .food-name, [class*="name"]'); const calEl = el.querySelector('.food-calories, [class*="calories"], .nutritional-column'); results.push({ name: titleEl?titleEl.textContent.trim():'', url: titleEl?.href||'', calories: calEl?calEl.textContent.trim():'' }); }); return { query: '{{query}}', results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract results
